…do more. How can we do more?

I talked earlier about the fact--and you helped with this, Senator  Schumer, when we were battling, many of us, and I know my friend Lisa  Blunt Rochester was a leader in the House when we said: Why are so many  women dying in childbirth in a postpartum period in America? It is  shameful that we are the worst Nation of all…

Ms. HIRONO.
